name: Avocado Farming Packet
description: The Avocado Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationor theOrbital Exchange Interfaceand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector fiveAvocadoseeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.
